title: Consolidate overview stats components into shared OverviewStats component
description: Consolidate the duplicate overview stats display logic currently scattered across Dashboard, NavigationSidebar, and DevlogList components into a single, reusable OverviewStats component. This will ensure consistent display across the application and eliminate code duplication.

notes.content: Completed: Already completed as confirmed by user

context.businessContext: Users need consistent overview stats across all pages to understand project status at a glance. Having different presentations creates confusion and makes the UI feel fragmented.
context.technicalContext:
Currently, stats are displayed in three different components with similar but not identical styling and logic:
1. Dashboard component - detailed stats in header with all status types
2. NavigationSidebar - compact stats card with total, in-progress, completed  
3. DevlogList - sticky header stats with total, in-progress, done, todo, blocked

Each has its own CSS and slightly different data handling, making maintenance difficult and creating inconsistency.
acceptanceCriteria: Create shared OverviewStats component that accepts stats and display variant props
Support different display variants: detailed (dashboard), compact (sidebar), header (devlog list)
Ensure consistent styling and color scheme across all variants
Replace all existing stats display logic with the new component
Maintain existing functionality while eliminating code duplication
Ensure responsive design works across all variants
